English: Dalian subprovincial city in Liaoning province `遼寧省~|辽`宁~`省~ in northeast China

d.f: `城市~`名~。`在~`遼寧省~`大連灣~`西南~`岸~。`濱~`臨~`黃海~，`靠近~`渤海~，`水~`深廣~`而~`不~`凍~，`為~`遼東半島~`第一~`良~`港~，`東北~`第一~`商港~。`工商業~`發達~，`地~`當~`東北九省~`客~`貨~`出入~`總~`門戶~，`中長鐵路~`終點~，`是~`東北~`第~`四大~`都市~。

Deutsch: Lüta, Hafenstadt Provinz Liaoning, China. It has annexed  `旅順~ Lüshun (Port Arthur), with which it was formerly combined into the joint municipality of Lüda.  (Eig, Geo)
English: Dalian subprovincial city in Liaoning province `遼寧省~|辽`宁~`省~ in northeast China
